<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 6"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Startling Appearance (Vigilante)](/Feats.aspx?ID=2088) <actions string="Single Action" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=12" />
<trait label="Emotion" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=60" />
<trait label="Fear" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=68" />
<trait label="Mental" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=106" />
<trait label="Vigilante" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=326" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Advanced Player's Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=39) pg. 197 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

**Archetype** [Vigilante](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=80)

**Prerequisites**
[Vigilante Dedication](/Feats.aspx?ID=2083)

**Requirements**
You are completely [unnoticed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=41) by the target creature.

</column>

---

You can startle foes who are unaware of your presence. Make a Strike against your target. That creature is [flat-footed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=16) against this Strike, as normal. If your Strike hits, the target remains flat-footed for the rest of your turn and is [frightened 1](/Conditions.aspx?ID=19) (frightened 2 on a critical hit).

<title level="2">Startling Appearance (Vigilante) leads to...</title>
[Frightening Appearance](/Feats.aspx?ID=2092), [Stunning Appearance](/Feats.aspx?ID=2093)
name: Startling Appearance (Vigilante)
requirement: You are completely  unnoticed  by the target creature.
